import React, { Component } from 'react' import moment from 'moment' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Row' class ProjectCardComponent extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { project: props.project } } render() { const date = moment(this.state.project.createdDate).format('MMM DD, YYYY'); return (
this.props.cardClicked(this.state.project.uniqueId)}> {/* Project Name and Venue */}

{this.state.project.name}

{this.state.project.venue}
 {/* Type and Created Date */}

{this.state.project.estimateType} Estimate

Created: {date}

) } } export default ProjectCardComponent
